title.narrative: Local Governance for Comminications in Aceh Phase II (LOGICA 2)

description.narrative: Local Governance for Comminications in Aceh Phase II (LOGICA 2) is a Gampong (village) based program that will support Acehnese citizens to prioritise their needs and advocate for services that produce tangible improvements in living standards. A key objective id to contribute to a stable and peaceful Aceh by supporting effective governance to address priority community needs and improve living standards. LOGICA 2 will facilitate effective transactions between Gampong communities and governments resulting in citizens accessing and governments delivering resources and services to improve living standards. The total value of this initiative is $29.6 million over 5 years, starting 2009-10.
